author: pamarcelot
msg: Fixed the issue on Windows where the application was 'unable to locate its companion shared library'.

author: hibou
msg: As discussed on ant-dev, move the updatesite so it has its own tags-branches-trunk structure

author: xavier
msg: FIX: NullPointerException when Ivy cannot locate pom parent (IVY-927)

author: brett
msg: [NMAVEN-8] correct multiple issues related to running NUnit tests. It is now possible to use the original release binaries unmodified.
Add necessary tools for any plugin to be able to map artifacts to their final name for reuse.
Merged from: r700374:700774 on branch NMAVEN-8-nunit
